rule: The part of speech tag should be one of the tags listed in the task: CC, CD, DT, EX, FW, IN, JJ, JJR, JJS, LS, MD, NN, NNS, NNP, NNPS, PDT, POS, PRP, PRP$, RB, RBR, RBS, RP, SYM, TO, UH, VB, VBD, VBG, VBN, VBP, VBZ, WDT, WP, WP$, WRB.
input: sentence: He reads a book every night., word: book
validityText:
The sentence "He reads a book every night." is a valid English sentence containing alphabets, spaces, and allowed punctuation. 
The word "book" is a valid English word present in the given sentence and is a single continuous string of characters without spaces.

OK
